name: tabbymansion
description: Focus session timer with tab activity tracking

scripts.build:test: set NODE_ENV=test && webpack --config webpack.config.js && node build.js
scripts.build:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && webpack --config webpack.config.js && node build.js
scripts.build:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && webpack --config webpack.config.js && node build.js
